text: sang-gihala mosega geuui baegseong eul wihae mul-eul guhamae hananim-i mo seege ne jipang-ilo geu bawileul ttae lila hani geugos-eulobuteo yeoldugaeui saem-i sos-anawa gag bujogdeul-eun geudeul i masilgos-eul al-assdoda hananim-i jusin yangsig-eul meoggo masidoe hyeonsee seo haeag-eul peotteuliji malla
